subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Pete Sampras faces Mikael Pernfors on Wednesday to open The Championships at The Palisades, the third and final event of the year for Sampras in the Outback Champions Series.
snippet: Pete Sampras faces Mikael Pernfors on Wednesday to open The Championships at The Palisades, the third and final event of the year for Sampras in the Outback Champions Series.
